data.text: Zìi zumɔ, è wɛlɛ mà kpidii,
Nuɓusɛiti ti ɠɛ ʋa faa nɔpɛ kɛɛzu,
Ee, GALA, nà wooɠulazu è ma, mazɔlɔɔ ɗa gòoɠaaʋote!
Makɛ mà ga nu ɠaazuleegi ɠɛʋele,
màaɠooza sìli nuiti ba, ti wɔ̀inzeɠezu,
ta kɔ̀ɠɔʋo ba, ti ɠoolia mà,
eɠɛ zalai nii pului ma, é anii zosu é bali ga,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wuzeɠe, è li è ti laaɠomi, è ti ɠaavala!
Ɗɔun kìzo niima nuiti ma, è-zɛbɛi ʋɔ, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Nɔ̀un nà, nà-telebodai ʋɔ, nà è-ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa,
